name: SABARAT
description:
SABARAT

The Journey

Story

After three days of walking, you've finally reached SABARAT.

You need one of the three sacred GEMS.

But stealing it will unleash the mountain's WRATH.

Gameplay

Use the Up and Down arrows to avoid the rocks.

Hearts increase lives.

Try to last until you get home.

Features

- Fast paced action

- Seamless level transition

- Day-night cycle


Official Discord
